home.title: Thiefdom Solo Helper
home.play1: Play Thiefdom with your guild alone against the guards.
home.play2: This application implements the official solo mode of Thiefdom. It replaces the solo patrol board and the compass and guides you through the game.

map.title: City Boards
map.arrange: Place the city boards in this way:

setup.title: Components
setup.gameBoard: Set up the game like a 2-player game. You don't need the patrol boards.
setup.playerBoard: As usual, take a player board and the materials in the color of your guild. However, return planning token #4 back to the box.
setup.rivalThieves: Place 3 rival thieves next to the board.
setup.draftEquipment: To draft equipment, first draw 3 cards, pick 1 of them, then draw 2 cards, again keep 1, then draw another single card from the deck.
setup.buyEquipment: From the 3 equipment, you can now buy 0–2 equipment and distribute it among your thieves as you wish.
setup.gainEquipmentVP: Receive the VP depicted on the equipment you bought.

ruleChanges.title: Rule Changes in Solo Game
ruleChanges.townsfolkMovement: The townsfolk and rival thief movements are controlled by the application.
ruleChanges.enterLocationRival: If you enter a location with a rival thief, you lose 1 VP per rival thief in that location.
ruleChanges.getArrested: If you get arrested in a solo game, goods are discarded and not placed in the dungeon.

roundStart.title: Planning
roundStart.planningTokens: Plan the order in which the thieves will perform the actions by placing the planning tokens face up on your player board.

turnBot.title: Townsfolk
turnBot.compassInstruction: Move the figure in the indicated direction. If it cannot move in this direction (wall, house/location, dead-end street or because the guard cannot move backwards), move it in alternative directions following the arrow. Fall back to the indicated direction whenever possible.

roundEnd.title: Administration
roundEnd.staminaMarker: Return the stamina marker and collect your planning tokens.
roundEnd.alleySpace: Receive 1 VP for each thief you have on an alley space.

round24.title: Additionally:
round24.bagTokens: Flip the bag tokens of the nobles on the loot board to the side with the goods shown.
round24.lootBoard: Refill the loot board with badges from the supply, back to one badge per designated slot.
round24.smugglingMission: Place 1 smuggling mission from the deck on each smugglers’ designated slot, if it’s empty.
round24.equipmentCards: The equipment cards on display are discarded and replaced with 4 cards from the deck.
